discourse_list.title: Morning Opening Schedule Review & Greg hosts the circle, Council of Berlin, Day Two (Video)

content.content: @boris goes over the schedule for Day Two, and then @gcolvin hosts the circle and goes around. Video:    view.ly    Morning Opening Session, Greg Hosts the Circle - FEM Council of Berlin - Day Two Sunday morning, where we gather everyone to go over the schedule for the day, and then hand over to Greg Colvin to host the circle of feedback and discussion. Thanks to for sponsoring the video crew & streaming.
